# init()

**Initializer**

Creates an empty audio class description.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Initializers

- **init(mType:mSubType:mManufacturer:)**: Creates an audio class description for the type, subtype, and manufacturer.

items.description: Creates an audio class description for the type, subtype, and manufacturer.
items.name: init(mType:mSubType:mManufacturer:)
